contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Nowy Dwór Gdański | image_skyline = Nowydworgd.JPG | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = Ulica Sikorskiego, Nowy Dwór Gdański | image_flag = Flaga Nowego Dworu Gd..svg | image_shield = POL Nowy Dwór Gdański COA.svg | pushpin_map = Poland | coordinates_region = PL | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = {{POL}} | subdivision_type1 = [[Voivodeships of Poland|Voivodeship]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Pomeranian Voivodeship|Pomeranian]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Powiat|County]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Nowy Dwór Gdański County]] | subdivision_type3 = [[Gmina]] | subdivision_name3 = [[Gmina Nowy Dwór Gdański]] | area_total_km2 = 5.06 | population_as_of = 2012 | population_total = 10171 | population_density_km2 = auto | latd = 54 | latm = 13 | lats = | latNS = N | longd = 19 | longm = 7 | longs = | longEW = E | elevation_m = | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 82-100 | website = http://www.miastonowydwor.pl/ }} '''Nowy Dwór Gdański''' {{IPAc-pl|'|n|o|w|y|-|'|d|w|u|r|-|'|g|d|a|ń|s|k|J|i}} ({{lang-de|Tiegenhof}}) is a [[town]] in [[Poland]], capital of [[Nowy Dwór Gdański County]], located in [[Pomeranian Voivodeship]], with 10,171 inhabitants (2012). [[File:nowy dwor gd dworcowa.JPG|left|thumb|Dworcowa street]] [[File:nowy dwor gd wieza.JPG|left|thumb|The water tower]] ==International relations== ===Twin towns — Sister cities=== {{See also|List of twin towns and sister cities in Poland}} Nowy Dwór Gdański is [[Town twinning|twinned]] with:<ref name="Hennef">{{cite web |url=http://www.hennef.de/verwaltung/dienstleistungen/dienstleistung.php?id=37&menuid=4&topmenu=7 |title=Städtepartnerschaften |accessdate=2008-07-04 |publisher=Ilona Gerken, Stadt Hennef |language=German}}</ref> {| class="wikitable" |- valign="top" | * {{flagicon|GER}} [[Hennef (Sieg)]], [[Germany]] – since 2001<ref name="Hennef"/> * {{flagicon|UKR}} [[Sarny]], [[Ukraine]] * {{flagicon|RUS}} [[Svetly, Kaliningrad Oblast]], [[Russia]] * {{flagicon|CZE}} [[Velká nad Veličkou]], [[Czech Republic]] |} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons|Nowy Dwór Gdański}} *[http://www.miastonowydwor.pl/ Official webpage] {{coord|54|13|N|19|07|E|region:PL_type:city|display=title}} <br> {{Nowy Dwór Gdański County}} {{Gmina Nowy Dwór Gdański}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Nowy Dwor Gdanski}} [[Category:Cities and towns in Pomeranian Voivodeship]] [[Category:Nowy Dwór Gdański County]] {{Pomeranian-geo-stub}}
